attributes.action: Create a Skills Program to train people in Britain for any skills shortage BEFORE accepting migrant workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment the FIRST option to deal with skills shortages e.g.doctors seems to be to bring in migrant workers. While I think that it is important to be able to use migrants in these circumstances, I do not want Britain to become a nation of poorly skilled slaves to highly trained migarants.
